description: As a student in financial mathematics with a profound passion for information technology, I have cultivated a broad expertise in software development. With a rich technical portfolio and deep knowledge in languages such as C#, JavaScript and specialized skills in ASP.NET Core, Blazor, I have substantial hands-on experience in programming and application development. My work experience, ranging from C# and .NET programming to network administration and information security, has significantly influenced my professional growth. Certifications in programming and information security have prepared me for the challenges of the tech market. With qualities such as time management, problem-solving, and communication skills, I aspire to make significant contributions to innovative projects in the future.
skills: Desktop and Web App Development: ASP.NET Core, WPF, Angular, React
Front-End Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular
Collaboration and Version Control: Git, Teamwork
Testing and Debugging: Application Testing, Debugging
detailOrQuote: I am deeply passionate about software development, driven by the thrill of solving complex problems in innovative ways. My goal is to create tech solutions that are not only robust but also user-centered and accessible to all.
